text: John Sainsbury may refer to: *John James Sainsbury (1844–1928), co-founder of the major UK supermarket chain Sainsbury's *John Benjamin Sainsbury (1871–1956), eldest son of John James Sainsbury and Sainsbury's chairman 1928–1956 *John Sainsbury, Baron Sainsbury of Preston Candover (born 1927), great-grandson of John James Sainsbury and Sainsbury's chairman 1969–1992 *John Sainsbury (cricketer) (1927–2004), cricketer for Somerset
title: John Sainsbury
